rules_text:
Enchant opponent
At the beginning of enchanted player's upkeep, they lose 1 life and you gain 1 life.
flavor_text: [i]“Aye, I see nothin' but black from that side, but I won't hide in shame behind a patch. The Admiral deserves to see his handiwork as I run my sword clean through his heart.”[/i]
